column4: i'm having some issues with my external hard drive though, is anyone around to advice me?
can anyone answer a quick question?
cool so i just installed ubuntu and im trying to access my external hard drive
im running the latest ubuntu i think its 11.4 or something
and well i tried to follow this website on how to detect your external hd
but now it kind of detects it but shows nothing inside
it shows a folder called lost and found
it detects your HD and shows it contains los/found
type sudo fdisk -l |pastebinit and paste the url here
no, use pastebinit, it returns a url, paste that here
you'll see, it's very easy and handy
you're learning, like we all had
read this to get an idea http://johnlewis.ie/converting-to-gpt-in-ubuntu/
